roleset.name: to restore after damage or injury
roleset.note: REPAIR-V NOTES: No Vncls. FN not applicable to this sense. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from repair.01-v)
REPAIR-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to repair.01-v. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from repair.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: It refinanced the judge 's loan , lowered its interest rate and accepted a trade-in that had n't originally been part of the deal -- a beat up 1981 Chevy Citation [0]-1 [the dealer]-2 had [*-2] to repair [*T*-1] before it could be resold [*-140] .

example.name: passive
example.text: [The Belgian computer system]-2 finally was repaired [*-2]on Tuesday of this week , with the aid of Toronto Stock Exchange officials who [*T*-1] developed the system .
example.arg: with the aid of Toronto Stock Exchange officials who [*T*-1] developed the system

example.name: unspecified subject
example.text: Engineers say it will take at least eight months [*] to repair the Embarcadero structure .

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: repairs to gas and electric power systems
example.arg: to gas and electric power systems
